message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
I'm willing to give you a bit more, Bob, but I still need a fair share. How about this?
Come on, Alice, I'm being reasonable here. Don't let the money lose more value!
Let's compromise. I'll take a little less than before, but I'm not going to give you the whole pie, Bob.
We're running out of time, Alice. You're not going to get a better deal than this. Think about the inflation!
Bob, we need to be reasonable.  I'm willing to meet you halfway, but we can't keep losing money to inflation!
